name: Hungry Bunny (itch) (Anagh's World)
description:
A game made by Anagh's World for 5 different Jams Ranked #1 in Visuals, Audio & Overall Game Enjoyment categories for Trijam #157

For better experience, play in FULLSCREEN and with HEADSETS. This game can also be played on a Mobile/Tab.

To own a personal local copy of the game, please download Windows playable version available at the end of the page. Linux & Mac users please use Wine to run the .exe file.

Plot

The bunny is lost in a magical world and is very hungry and angry. Feed him with fruits to satisfy his hunger and cool him down.

Jams & Themes

  • Trijam #157: The Angriest Protagonist
    • The main character of the game is the bunny and he is hungry and very very angry.
  • Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1: It is not real
    • The world in this game is not real, it's magical. There are fruits that appear from nowhere. The rhino is smaller than the bunny. The bunny is more interested in eating the fruits, rather than eating his favorite food ie. carrots.
  • Jame Gam: Lost
    • The bunny is lost in the magical world.
  • InspireJam: Create anything inspired by something else
    • I got so much inspired by the beautiful artwork from PixelFrog (pixelfrog-assets) that I though of coming up with this game.
  • The 'Just Finish It' Game Jam [Seashell Game Jams #6]: Finish one of the many games you left aside
    • I had left working on a prototype (this game) for quite sometime, but then this jam made me finish it. I am happy that it turned out very well.

Goal

"Hungry Bunny" is a jumping game where the main goal of the game is to feed the hungry bunny. With each level, the bunny gets more hungry and angry.

Game Modes

There are 3 levels of difficulty - Easy, Medium & Hard.

Controls

  • Start / Pause - Enter Key
  • Move Left - A or Left Arrow Key
  • Move Right - D or Right Arrow Key
  • Jump / Double Jump - Space or W or Up Arrow Key
    • For double jump, don't press the button too fast. The bunny needs to be in the air, moving upwards, for the second jump to happen.
  • Virtual Controls are also provided to play the game on Mobile/Tab

Credits

  • Concept, Design & Programming
    • Anagh's World - using Godot 3.2.3
  • Graphics
    • Characters - pixelfrog-assets @ itch.io
    • Others - Anagh's World
  • Music
    • CodeManu @ opengameart.org (background music)
    • Anagh's World & Kenney @ kenney.nl (other sounds)
